Package com.intellij.openapi.wm

Interface StatusBar

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable, StatusBarInfo
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    StatusBarEx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IdeStatusBarImpl

    public interface StatusBar
extends StatusBarInfo, Disposable
    Status bar shown on the bottom of IDE frame.

    Displays status text and a number of builtin and custom widgets.

    See Also:
    StatusBarWidgetFactory
